item.title: Chab add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "Rats and roaches live by competition under the laws of supply and demand; it is the privilege of human beings to live under the laws of justice and mercy." -- Wendell Berry

item.title: Chab add a quote by Kenneth Rexroth
item.description: "I write for one and only one purpose, to overcome the invincible ignorance of the traduced heart. [â€¦] I wish to speak to and for those who have had enough of the Social Lie, the Economics of Mass Murder, the Sexual Hoax, and the Domestication of Conspicuous Consumption." -- Kenneth Rexroth

item.title: Chab add a quote by Henry Beston
item.description: "Nature is a part of our humanity, and without some awareness and experience of that divine mystery man ceases to be man." -- Henry Beston

item.title: Chab add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink." -- e.e. cummings
